name: Soft Focus Blending Brush
description:
The perfect makeup brush for blending makeup seamlessly into skin. Use to effortlessly blend CREAM HIGHLIGHT & CONTOUR STICKS for a soft, diffused finish.

Synthetic bristles. Wood handle. Cruelty-free.

Made in the USA.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
The perfect makeup brush for blending makeup seamlessly into skin. Use to effortlessly blend CREAM HIGHLIGHT & CONTOUR STICKS for a soft, diffused finish.

Synthetic bristles. Wood handle. Cruelty-free.

Made in the USA.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Tinted Matte Balm
description:
A moisturizing, satin-matte balm that glides on for lightweight colour in a universal shade of plum. Formulated with natural oils and wax for comfortable, moisturizing wear on lips, eyes and cheeks.

Tinted Matte Balm comes with a pencil sharpener, designed for this unique wide wooden pencil.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

VERSATILE
One universal plum shade that can be used on lips, cheeks, or lids.

NO-FUSS APPLICATION
This no-fuss formula can be applied without a mirror, and the smooth, matte-balm texture is buildable, and can be worn on its own of layered with other products.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE
This formula is vegan cruelty-free.

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

RETURNS

MAY CONTAIN [+/-]: RED IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), BLACK IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), RED 7 LAKE (CI 15850).

name: Cream Contour Stick
description:
With a creamy, satin finish, this contour stick comes in two shades designed to work well across skin tones. The formula is designed for a smooth application and buildable finish that looks like real skin.

Made with:
Vitamin E: an antioxidant that prevents skin damage
Glycerin: for smooth, blend-able application
Vegetable Wax: acts as an emollient on the skin, making it soft, smooth and radiant
descriptionHtml:
With a creamy, satin finish, this contour stick comes in two shades designed to work well across skin tones. The formula is designed for a smooth application and buildable finish that looks like real skin.

Made with:
Vitamin E: an antioxidant that prevents skin damage 
Glycerin: for smooth, blend-able application 
Vegetable Wax: acts as an emollient on the skin, making it soft, smooth and radiant

name: Precision Colour Pencil
description:
APPLICATION TIPS

LIPSTICK: Line and fill in lips with the Precision Colour Pencil, or use Tapered Multi-Brush to blend colour onto lips. Wear alone or top with High-Shine Gloss for a dewy effect.

LIP LINER: Line lips with the pencil and finish with High-Shine Gloss or lip colour of choice.

EYELINER: Line lash line with pencil. Smudge with Tapered Multi-Brush for a smokey effect, or tap translucent powder on top to enhance wear.

EYESHADOW: Dot colour over eyelids and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

BLUSH/CONTOUR: Dot colour onto cheeks and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

HIGHLIGHT: Use highlight pencil on inner corners of eyes, along lash line, on high points of cheeks, cupid’s bow or brow bone.
descriptionHtml:
APPLICATION TIPS

LIPSTICK: Line and fill in lips with the Precision Colour Pencil, or use Tapered Multi-Brush to blend colour onto lips. Wear alone or top with High-Shine Gloss for a dewy effect.

LIP LINER: Line lips with the pencil and finish with High-Shine Gloss or lip colour of choice.

EYELINER: Line lash line with pencil. Smudge with Tapered Multi-Brush for a smokey effect, or tap translucent powder on top to enhance wear.

EYESHADOW: Dot colour over eyelids and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

BLUSH/CONTOUR: Dot colour onto cheeks and blend with fingertips or Tapered Multi-Brush to diffuse colour.

HIGHLIGHT: Use highlight pencil on inner corners of eyes, along lash line, on high points of cheeks, cupid’s bow or brow bone.

name: Graphite Brow Pencil
description:
A dual-ended brow pencil for defining your eyebrows.

Inspired by the texture of a graphite drawing pencil, this easy to use, hard formula allows for drawing precise, hair-like strokes, while the powdery finish creates easy, smooth application and blendability, with a spoolie on one end, for blending out your pencil and combing your brows.

LIGHT is a cool-toned grey-brown, designed for blonde and light brown brows or those looking for softer definition.

DARK is a cool-toned grey-black, designed for brown, and black brows, or those looking for strong definition.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

VERSATILE
Two shades that can work for everyone, with a spoolie for easy application.

LONG WEAR
Hard formula doesn’t smudge.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE
This formula is vegan cruelty-free.

LIGHT INGREDIENTS: Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide( CI 77891), Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Magnesium Stearate, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Stearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Isostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate.

DARK INGREDIENTS: Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Mica, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Magnesium Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Stearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Isostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate.

name: Cream Highlight Stick
description:
A creamy highlighting stick that gives you a glowing radiance without heavy sparkle.

This smooth formula glides onto skin and blends seamlessly to create a luminous finish. The super creamy texture applies with ease and blends for a finish that looks like skin. The light-weight formula is designed to work across different skin textures and tones, and does not settle into pores or fine lines.

PERLA is a neutral-toned pink.
MIELE is golden-nectar.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
A creamy highlighting stick that gives you a glowing radiance without heavy sparkle.

This smooth formula glides onto skin and blends seamlessly to create a luminous finish. The super creamy texture applies with ease and blends for a finish that looks like skin. The light-weight formula is designed to work across different skin textures and tones, and does not settle into pores or fine lines.

PERLA is a neutral-toned pink. 
MIELE is golden-nectar.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Water Colour Tint
description:
A unique water-balm hybrid formula for a sheer, weightless wash of colour on lips and cheeks, with a skin-like finish. The buildable formula can be layered for intensity.

PARNA is rose petal pink
MALNA is cool-pink mauve
TEGLA is warm muted-brick
TINTA is cool-toned inky plum

TEGLA is warm muted-brick 
TINTA is cool-toned inky plum

name: Kanari Limited Edition Precision Colour Pencil
description:
Introducing KANARI, a limited run of our Precision Colour Pencil in a primary yellow shade. This high pigment pencil glides on with a creamy-matte finish. Use with our new COLOUR SET SETTING POWDER to set any eye look.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Made in Italy.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
Introducing KANARI, a limited run of our Precision Colour Pencil in a primary yellow shade. This high pigment pencil glides on with a creamy-matte finish. Use with our new COLOUR SET SETTING POWDER to set any eye look.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Made in Italy.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Precision Highlight Pencil
description:
This is a highlight pencil for creating precise or soft highlights across skin tones.

LUSTRO is a cool-champagne, satin-pearl.
ORO is a warm-champagne, satin-pearl.

This fine-tip highlighting pencil allows you to create both a precise or diffused highlight anywhere on the face. Line lids to bring brightness to the eyes, use on brow bone, cupids bow, or high-points of cheeks for glow effect, or use on top of any lip colour for added lustre. The champagne pearl pigment is designed to create radiance across skin tones.

Designed for application wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, cheek bones or elsewhere. Draw on and blend out with brush or fingers for a highlight effect.

Made in Italy.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

HIGH PIGMENT NATURAL FORMULA
Made with a high percentage of pigment for an even, blendable application.

BALANCED TEXTURE
The creamy-matte formula balances precision and blendability for smooth, versatile application. Draw precise lines, blend and or buff out.

VERSATILE
Safe for use on lips, eyes, and cheeks. Blend, buff, line, define, smoke, draw, fill in.

HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS
Natural formula, vegan and cruelty free.

LUSTRO: OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, MICA, SILICA, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE, ORYZANOL, GLYCERYL UNDECYLENATE, TOCOPHEROL. MAY CONTAIN [+/-]: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491).

ORO INGREDIENTS: OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES, COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, MICA, SILICA, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE, ORYZANOL, GLYCERYL UNDECYLENATE, TOCOPHEROL. MAY CONTAIN [+/-]: TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, 77499).

A FRANK DECONSTRUCTION OF OUR FORMULATION:

OCTYLDODECYL STEAROYL STEARATE
Naturally occurring emollient that enhances viscosity

COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL
Natural emollient that increases moisture barrier

C10-18 TRIGLYCERIDES
A tri-ester derived from coconut oil that acts as an emollient

COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX
Hard wax that gives the pencil structure, derived from the carnauba tree of South America

HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL
Natural emollient

MICA
Mineral that improves colour impact

SILICA
A natural mineral that is used as an anti-caking agent that allows pigments to blend and creates smooth texture

POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE
Plant derived ingredient that acts as an emulsifier

ORYZANOL
Antioxidant from rice bran that prevents oxidation

GLYCERYL UNDECYLENATE
Glyceryl undecylenic acid monoester, acts as an emollient

TOCOPHEROL
Antioxidant to prevent oxidation

TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)
A naturally occurring colour pigment

IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)
Colour pigment

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

name: Colour Set Setting Powder
description:
A no-fuss, pocket perfect setting powder for eliminating shine and prolonging the wear time of makeup.

This weightless translucent powder can be applied on top of the PRECISION COLOUR PENCIL to stop colour transfer and increase wear-time, or can be applied to skin to eliminate shine. The super finely-milled silica allows the translucent shade to work across skin tones to set makeup without altering the colour, and to absorb oil.

Formulated without talc, silicones or nanoparticles. Vegan and cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

WEIGHTLESS FORMULA
Ultra-fine powder that creates a weightless matte veil to absorb oil and prevent makeup transfer.

POCKET PERFECT
Compact size that is perfect for on-the-go touch ups.

RESPONSIBLE
This formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of harmful ingredients.

SILICA, POLYQUATERNIUM-80, MALTOL.

A FRANK DECONSTRUCTION OF OUR FROMULATION:

Silica - a natural mineral found in clays that absorbs oils

Polyquaternium-80 - conditioning agent

Maltol - a natural anti-oxidizer

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

name: Precision Pencil Sharpener
description:
Manufactured specifically for a cosmetic pencil, this Dynamic Torsion Action blade pencil sharpener creates the perfect point. It allows you to individualize the tip from short and blunt to sharp and pointed.

Pair with Precision Colour Pencil.

Made in Ireland with a German-made blade.
descriptionHtml:
Manufactured specifically for a cosmetic pencil, this Dynamic Torsion Action blade pencil sharpener creates the perfect point. It allows you to individualize the tip from short and blunt to sharp and pointed.

Pair with Precision Colour Pencil.

Made in Ireland with a German-made blade.

name: Lash Tint Mascara
description:
LASH TINT MASCARA is a one-of-a kind, multi-purpose mascara than can be used to add a subtle tint of colour to lashes and brows.

This light-weight, smudge and flake proof mascara creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes and brows. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of hairs from fine to full. The precise wand and tubing formula provides a clean, smudge-free application and wear.

Made in the same lightweight, smudge-proof formula as the Black Lash Tint Mascara, the new Brown and Taupe shades allow for use in both lashes and brows for various hair colours.

TAUPE is a cool-toned light brown.
BROWN is a neutral chocolate brown.
BLACK is very black.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
LASH TINT MASCARA is a one-of-a kind, multi-purpose mascara than can be used to add a subtle tint of colour to lashes and brows.

This light-weight, smudge and flake proof mascara creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes and brows. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of hairs from fine to full. The precise wand and tubing formula provides a clean, smudge-free application and wear.

Made in the same lightweight, smudge-proof formula as the Black Lash Tint Mascara, the new Brown and Taupe shades allow for use in both lashes and brows for various hair colours.

TAUPE is a cool-toned light brown.
BROWN is a neutral chocolate brown.
BLACK is very black.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Tapered Multi-Brush
description: he perfect addition to the Precision Colour Pencil. Use for blending, diffusing or defining your colour on lids, lips, and cheeks. Bristles are packed at medium density for easy control of product, and blending. This multipurpose brush is made in Germany with synthetic fibre bristles and a natural wooden handle.
descriptionHtml: he perfect addition to the Precision Colour Pencil. Use for blending, diffusing or defining your colour on lids, lips, and cheeks. Bristles are packed at medium density for easy control of product, and blending. This multipurpose brush is made in Germany with synthetic fibre bristles and a natural wooden handle.

name: BRIGHT EYED DUO
description:
$44 value.

The perfect daily duo to create an eye-opening effect. The Lash Tint Mascara defines and lengthens lashes, while Lustro Precision Colour Pencil can be used to create light around the eyes.

Lash Tint Mascara is a light-weight, tubing, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, providing a clean, easy application and wear.

Made in Korea. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed to be applied wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

The Precision Colour Pencil is inspired by the classic artist’s tool, a wooden pencil. A pencil is the ideal format for added definition on eyes and lips, and our blendable formula allows for versatile application on all areas of the face.

Made in Italy and Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
descriptionHtml:
$44 value.

The perfect daily duo to create an eye-opening effect. The Lash Tint Mascara defines and lengthens lashes, while Lustro Precision Colour Pencil can be used to create light around the eyes.

Lash Tint Mascara is a light-weight, tubing, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, providing a clean, easy application and wear.

Made in Korea. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed to be applied wherever highlight is desired  — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

The Precision Colour Pencil is inspired by the classic artist’s tool, a wooden pencil. A pencil is the ideal format for added definition on eyes and lips, and our blendable formula allows for versatile application on all areas of the face.

Made in Italy and Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Compact Mirror
description: Limited edition compact mirror with magnetic closure. External vegan leather. Two sided 1x/10x mirrors for on-the-go makeup application and touch ups for makeup that lives with you.
descriptionHtml: Limited edition compact mirror with magnetic closure. External vegan leather. Two sided 1x/10x mirrors for on-the-go makeup application and touch ups for makeup that lives with you.

name: Zold Limited Edition Precision Colour Pencil
description:
Introducing ZOLD, a limited run of our Precision Colour Pencil in an emerald green shade. This high pigment pencil glides on with a creamy-matte finish. Use with our new COLOUR SET SETTING POWDER to set any eye look.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Made in Italy.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: The Daily Trio
description:
$68 value.

A starter set including High-Shine Gloss, Precision Colour Pencil in NEUTRA, and our Lash Tint Mascara.

NEUTRA, a universal neutral, created to compliment natural lip tones. This creamy pencil is soft enough to be used as a lipstick, blendable enough to be used as a blush or wash of colour on the lids, with a precision tip for drawing graphic lines.

High-Shine Gloss is completely clear with super fine flecks of mica, it glides on without stick, adding long-lasting shine and dew effect to lips, cheeks and lids. This hydrating gloss is made with ceramides and sodium hyaluronate for a moisturizing and plumping effect. Blend with Precision Colour Pencil for diffused, dewy colour.

LASH TINT MASCARA is a light-weight, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full. The precise wand and tubing formula provides a clean, smudge-free application and wear.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: Precision Pencil Trio
description:
$84 value.

Inspired by warm vibrant tones, the Precision Pencil Trio includes three Precision Colour Pencils – MELEG, ROZSA and NEUTRA, and Precision Pencil Sharpener.

This trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. All can be used to create a pop of colour on eyes, or warm flush of colour on lips, or cheeks.

ROZSA is a vibrant rose-pink; an energetic boost to your everyday pink.

MELEG is a fire orange with red undertones, which brings a warmth to the lips, eyes and cheeks.

NEUTRA is our universal Neutral: a dusty rose with warm undertones.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: DAY TO NIGHT TRIO
description:
A trio for bright, smoldering eyes; these three products bring definition, light and shadow to the eyes. The Lash Tint Mascara defines and lengthens lashes, with Barna bringing further definition, and can be used to create a smoked out eye, while the Lustro Precision Colour Pencil brings light around the eyes. Layered together, or used individually, these products create multiple possibilities for day and night time looks.

Lash Tint Mascara is a light-weight, tubing, smudge and flake proof mascara that creates the appearance of freshly tinted lashes. The super slim wand's small bristles separate, define and lengthen all types of lashes from fine to full, providing a clean, easy application and wear.

Made in Korea. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed to be applied wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

Made in Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan.

BARNA is a universal shade of brown with a rich-warm chocolate undertone and a hint of charcoal.

Made in Czech Republic. Cruelty Free & Vegan

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Multi-Purpose Trio
description:
$56 value.

A starter set including High-Shine Gloss, Precision Pencil sharpener, and a choice of a Precision Colour Pencil in VOROS, NEUTRA, or BARNA.

The Precision Colour Pencil is creamy enough to be used as a lipstick, blendable enough to be used as a contour or a wash of colour on the lids, with a precision tip for drawing graphic lines. Use with Precision Pencil Sharpener for the perfect, pointed tip.

Choose from VOROS, our timeless vibrant red, NEUTRA, a universal neutral, created to compliment natural lip tones, or BARNA, a deep charcoal brown shade that can be used to define eyes and create dimension on lips.

GLASS High-Shine Gloss is completely clear with super fine flecks of mica, it glides on without stick, adding long-lasting shine and dew effect to lips, cheeks and lids. Blend with Precision Colour Pencil for diffused, dewy colour.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: Colour Kit Two
description:
$84 value.

Inspired by an artist’s tool kit and techniques, Colour Kit Two includes three Precision Colour Pencils – Notte, Bor and Fiore, and Precision Colour Sharpener.

Colour Kit Two’s trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. Notte creates shadow, while Fiore brings warm energy, and Bor, a rich burgundy, is the perfect universal shades for colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks.

NOTTE is an indigo, navy blue.

BOR is a rich burgundy wine.

FIORE is a vibrant, melon coral.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: Colour Kit One
description:
$114 value.

Inspired by an artist’s tool kit and techniques, Colour Kit One includes three Precision Colour Pencils – Voros, Barna and Lustro, the Tapered Multi-Brush, and Precision Colour Sharpener, packaged in a reusable washed-paper case.

Colour Kit One’s trio of shades can be used together for a complete look, or on their own. Barna creates shadow, while Lustro brings light, and Voros, a true red, gives a timeless, seasonless pop of colour.

Tapered Multi-Brush is designed to buff and blend colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks, and create diffused lines, with soft, synthetic fibre bristles, at a medium density.

BARNA is a universal shade of brown with a rich-warm chocolate undertone and a hint of charcoal.

LUSTRO is a champagne, satin-pearl, highlighting pencil.

VOROS is a universal vibrant, true red.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

name: Mini Precision Pencil Trio
description:
The perfect pocket-sized kit for the holidays and beyond. The Mini Precision Pencil Trio includes two Precision Colour Pencil shades BARNA and NEUTRA, our new Precision Highlight Pencil in ORO, and a Precision Pencil Sharpener, enclosed in a limited edition washed-paper wallet.

ORO is a warm-champagne that can be used to highlight inner corners of eyes, brow bone, nose, used as a subtle shimmering eyeshadow, or to add soft shimmer on lips.

NEUTRA is warm dusty-rose that is the perfect lip shade, or can be used as blush or eyeshadow for a rosy wash of colour.

BARNA is a deep charcoal brown that can be used to create definition around the eyes and lips, or used as a contour.

Draw, blend, line, define, buff: a minimalist approach with maximalist options.

Vegan & Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

name: Counter Top Precision Colour Pencil Set
description:
$188 value
A set of our seven original PRECISION COLOUR PENCIL shades and a PRECISION PENCIL SHARPENER held in a reusable glass cup, perfect for your vanity.

Create a full makeup look with this set of Precision Colour Pencils. Formulated to be used on eyes, lips and cheeks, these high-pigment pencils glide on with a creamy-matte finish. They are creamy enough to use as a lipstick, blendable enough to be used as a blush or a wash of colour on the lids, with a precision tip for drawing graphic lines.

Cruelty-free.

Shopping from Canada? Click here ﻿.

BOLD COLOUR
Made with a high percentage of pigment for bright, bold, lasting colour.

BALANCED TEXTURE
The creamy-matte formula balances precision and blendability for smooth, versatile application. Draw precise lines, blend and or buff out.

VERSATILE
Safe for use on lips, eyes, and cheeks. Blend, buff, line, define, smoke, draw, fill in.

RESPONSIBLE
This formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of harmful ingredients.

Counter Top Precision Colour Pencil Set Ingredients:

VOROS, LUSTRO INGREDIENTS: Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, C10-18 Triglycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Mica, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Oryzanol, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Tocopherol. May contain [+/-]: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), YELLOW 5 LAKE (CI 19140), RED 6 LAKE (CI 15850).

NEUTRA, BARNA, ROSZA, MELEG INGREDIENTS: Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, C10-18 Triglycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Silica, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Oryzanol, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Tocopherol. May contain [+/-]: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850).

WASSER INGREDIENTS: Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, C10-18 Triglycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Silica, Kaolin, Oryzanol, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Tocopherol. May contain [+/-]: Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742).

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

RETURNS

We want you to love your 19/99 Beauty product. If you aren’t happy with the product, we will provide a refund or an exchange for any product ordered from 1999beauty.com within 30 days of purchase. Just email us with your name, order number, and reason for return at hello@1999beauty.com

name: High-Shine Gloss
description:
Description BENEFITS INGREDIENTS SHIPPING

High-Shine Gloss is a clear, hydrating gloss made with ceramides and sodium hyaluronate for a moisturizing and plumping effect.

This lightweight, gel-cushion formula is completely clear with super fine flecks of mica to add shine to lips, cheek bones, eye lids, or elsewhere.

Blend with Precision Colour Pencil for diffused, dewy colour.

Made in Canada.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.

LASTING SHINE
Gel-cushion texture stays on for comfortable, long-wear shine.

PLUMPING
Seals and protects skin against water loss. High-shine reflects light to enhance skin texture.

MOISTURIZING
Ceramides and sodium hyaluronate help to keep skin hydrated.

RESPONSIBLE
Non-irritating, vegan, cruelty-free, in a recyclable, sugar-cane derived, plastic tube.

HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER, TRIPELARGONIN,TRIOLEIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, OLIVE GLYCERIDES, CERAMIDE 3, MICA, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

A FRANK DECONSTRUCTION OF OUR FORMULATION:

HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE
A safe, mineral-oil alternative for intense cushion, glide and plumping effect. This ingredient gives the gloss an occlusive effect, meaning it seals in moisture and prevents water loss.

ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
Gel texture that stabilizes the formula and improves skin occlusivity

BUTYLENE/ETHYLENE/STYRENE COPOLYMER
Gel texture that stabilizes the formula and improves skin occlusivity

TRIPELARGONIN
Plant derived ester that acts as an emulsifying agent and provides softening effect

TRIOLEIN
Plant derived ingredient that acts as an emulsifying agent

SODIUM HYALURONATE
Improves moisturization and skin barrier function

OLIVE GLYCERIDES
Olive oil improves the bioavailability of the ceramides and sodium hyaluronate to deliver faster benefits to the skin

CERAMIDE 3
Improves moisturization and skin barrier function

MICA
White pearlescent to increase luster

TITANIUM DIOXIDE
White pearlescent to increase luster

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days of purchase. You will receive an email confirmation once your order has shipped.

East Coast shipping takes 2-4 business days. West Coast shipping takes 5 - 8 business days.

Shipping is free for all orders over $30.

We ship within Canada and the United States. Shopping from elsewhere? Check out our stockists.

RETURNS

We want you to love your 19/99 Beauty product. If you aren’t happy with the product, we will provide a refund or an exchange for any product ordered from 1999beauty.com within 30 days of purchase. Just email us with your name, order number, and reason for return at hello@1999beauty.com

name: Precision Pencil Duo
description:
$52 value.

Two of our creamy-matte Precision Colour Pencil Shades for eyes, lips and cheeks.

Pick between four different pencil combinations, including the shades:

VOROS, our timeless vibrant red for the perfect statement lip, bold red liner, or rosy flush of colour on eyes, lips, or cheeks.

NEUTRA, our signature, universal neutral, created to compliment natural lip tones. Use to define lip shape, as lip colour, blush, or eyeshadow or liner.

BARNA, a deep charcoal brown shade that can be used to define eyes and create dimension on lips. This shade can also be used as contour pencil.

LUSTRO, a champagne, satin-pearl pencil that creates a soft highlight effect across skin tones. Designed for application wherever highlight is desired — inner corner of eyes, along lash line, brow bone, cupid’s bow, or elsewhere.

The Precision Colour Pencil is inspired by the classic artist’s tool, a wooden pencil. A pencil is the ideal format for added definition on eyes and lips, and our blendable formula allows for versatile application on all areas of the face.

Made it Italy.

Cruelty Free & Vegan.

Shopping from Canada? Click here.
